mainSequence.step: Enhanced Research Data Management Platform saves dataset information
Enhanced Research Data Management Platform prompts depositor to link with DMP
Enhanced Research Data Management Platform requests DMP details from Data Management Plan Tool
Data Management Plan Tool queries DMP Repository by reference
DMP Repository returns DMP details to Data Management Plan Tool
Data Management Plan Tool provides DMP details to Enhanced Research Data Management Platform
Enhanced Research Data Management Platform links dataset with DMP in Dataset Repository
Dataset Repository updates DMP with dataset linkage
Dataset Repository confirms dataset-DMP linkage to Enhanced Research Data Management Platform
Enhanced Research Data Management Platform confirms dataset linked with DMP to Depositor
